sentence: Whitmer is facing a cavalcade of possible Republican challengers, including former Detroit Police Chief James Craig and conservative media personality Tudor Dixon, and her ability or inability to fend off her ultimate challenger will indicate how Democrats are able to rebut coronavirus-related criticism and compete in Rust Belt swing states like Michigan, Pennsylvania and Wisconsin.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Eleven interesting races to watch in 2022

sentence: The leading candidate in Michigan's Republican primary, James Craig, seems to have reversed his allyship to the LGBTQ community, saying he'd want a "more aggressive" version of Florida's controversial "Don't Say Gay" bill.
author: Katherine Fung
title: Former LGBT Ally Wants 'More Aggressive' 'Don't Say Gay' Bill in Michigan

sentence: Michigan Republican front-runner James Craig has pledged to do whatever I can? to keep that law in place should he win the governorship.
author: Cameron Joseph
title: The 2022 elections could determine the fate of abortion access for years in a number of major swing states.
